issue.title: [Rust][Parquet] Add method to return compressed size of row group
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11479](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11479). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a method to return the compressed size of all columns in the row group. This will help with calculating the total compressed size of the Parquet File.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11479?focusedCommentId=17278772) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9401
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9401>
